description: A mobile-first inventory management application built with React Native/Expo for barcode scanning, stock counting, and inventory verification.

features.name: User Authentication
features.description: Secure login system with JWT tokens, remember me functionality, and role-based access control
requirements: Users can login with username and password
Remember me option saves username for next login
Invalid credentials show appropriate error messages
Users can logout from any screen

features.name: Staff Dashboard
features.description: Home screen for staff users showing quick stats, session management, and navigation
requirements: Quick access to create new counting session

features.name: Session Management
features.description: Create, resume, and manage stock counting sessions
requirements: Create new session with floor and rack location
Session data persists when app closes

features.name: Barcode Scanning
features.description: Camera-based barcode scanning for item identification
requirements: Request camera permission on first use

technicalStack.styling: React Native StyleSheet with custom design system
